data.eml:eml: Characterization of Platymessa with redescription of the type species and a new generic synonymy (Arachnida, Opiliones, Cosmetidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Medrano, Miguel, Kury, Adriano B. (2016): Characterization of Platymessa with redescription of the type species and a new generic synonymy (Arachnida, Opiliones, Cosmetidae). Zootaxa 4085 (1): 52-62, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4085.1.2
